actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: To amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require Members of Congress to disclose business ties with foreign entities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Congressional Foreign Entanglement Disclosure and Reduction Act
subjects: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

summary.text:
Congressional Foreign Entanglement Disclosure and Reduction Act

This bill expands financial disclosure reporting provisions to require Members of Congress to include in their report any business ties the Member or his or her immediate family has with a foreign entity.

titles.title: Congressional Foreign Entanglement Disclosure and Reduction Act
